Name: S.H.E.L.T.E.R. - An Apocalyptic Tale
About the game: Set in a post-apocalyptic world where you, together with a few other survivors, are lucky enough to find a new home in the form of a modern shelter. It has enough supplies to provide life for over a century, but sometimes it makes you wonder about what lies beyond it. - Become the mayor of the settlement and improve lives of your loyal citizens. - Survive in a post-apocalyptic world and build relationships with other survivors. - Make choices that will shape your characterâ€™s personality and the world around him. - Romance or corrupt 10 different characters. - Experience over 100 sex scenes.
